flawed_nl_solution:
There are 30 games total because 20 + 10 = <<20+10=30>>30
They need to win 20 games because 30 x (2/3) = <<30*(2/3)=20>>20
The need to win 10 more games because 20 - 12 = <<20-12=10>>10

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 8, not 10. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
